【Easy Assembly, Buy with Confidence】:All tools, hardware and instructions are included. It is easy to install. You could use this computer workstation as a portable presentation lectern, mobile standing computer desk, laptop desk.

【Adjustable Height&Easy Move】: This kind of mobile laptop desk can be adjusted to your ideal position from 24" to 35.4". You can use the adjustable height mobile desk sitting or standing and the mobile computer desk which have 4 smooth wheels can also make desk move wherever you want.

【With additional shelf】Waterproof, non-deformation, durable, three-layer shelf can store or decorate your desk. Allows you to put some books, plants or what you want on the desk, and also makes you feel comfortable. Store books, office supplies, and daily necessities anytime, anywhere.

【After-sales service】If you have any questions about our products, or have any packaging damage or parts problems, please feel free to contact us for replacement or refund. Please rest assured to buy.

Our table is beautiful and can be a scenery everywhere.It can also be used for the height of simple dining tables, laptops, learning tables, adjustable computer table.

advantage Waterproof: The surface of the table is smooth and waterproof. Easy to clean: Just wipe with a wet rag to clean. Abrasion resistance: As long as it is not deliberately scratched the table, there are generally no scratches, and the abrasion resistance is very good.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 27, 2023
reviews.reviewText: One of the standout features of this desk is its compact design. It is incredibly space-saving, allowing me to set it up in a corner without feeling cramped. The dimensions provided on the product page were accurate, and it fits perfectly in my small apartment office. Despite its size, the desk offers ample surface area for my laptop, a notepad, and other essentials. The sturdy construction ensures that it can hold the weight of my devices without wobbling or feeling flimsy. I appreciate the durable materials used in its construction, as it gives me confidence that this desk will last for a long time. The assembly process was straightforward and hassle-free. The package included clear instructions, and all the necessary tools were provided. I was able to put it together on my own within 20 minutes. The desk arrived in perfect condition, well-packaged to protect it during transit. Additionally, I particularly appreciate the thoughtful design details.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 26, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars A Good Buy For A Small, Rolling Desk
reviews.reviewText: My husband is laid up for a while and needed a desk near his favorite chair while he recuperates. We decided to buy this desk so that he can do his work from his chair. It was very easy to assemble and surprisingly pretty stable. The wheels work, too. The height is adjustable. The desk takes up almost no space. And there is plenty of room on the surface of the desk. When my husband wants to work, we roll up the desk and place it in front of his chair and he can place his laptop, his phone, a drink, and his paperwork on his desk. Sometimes he uses it to eat on it too. We are very happy with the purchase.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 7, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Nice size, easy to assemble, very versatile
reviews.reviewText: I had to come back to increase my rating from a 3 to a 4. The size is great, I like the rounded corners, and I like that the height is adjustable. The shelves below help with its versatility. However, because the metal is very thin, the top tray seems to start to bend down with the slightest pressure. I would not recommend putting anything really heavy on top of it. The middle shelf could be about 2" deeper, and it would be nice if the poles which holds the top tray, had some type of plugs in them so the sharp metal edges were covered. The end of the metal frame by the shelves came with plastic plugs in them that had to be trimmed. I'm assuming that the plastic "peeled" when the plugs were pressed into the metal to cover the sharp edges. It was an easy fix with an exacto knife. With all that being said, it really is a decent, very versatile product.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 8, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Functional, minimal desk that looks great
reviews.reviewText: This desk was so easy to put together and it looks sophisticated and minimal without a lot of frills which is exactly what I wanted. It has wheels and adjustable so I’ve been able to push it to different spots in my apartment to work and have worked pretty much everywhere! I would definitely recommend this if you don’t like to work in one spot and want something that’s easy and looks good.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 12, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great size, helped this college student
reviews.reviewText: I bought this because I don't have room for a desk in my house and this fit perfectly next to the empty space near my couch. I got this right before finals and it saved my life. I was able to do hours on this in different parts of my living room due to being able to move it with ease. This will hopefully help me thru 2 more years of college. It was also so easy to assemble. 5 stars from me!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 20, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great Moveable hobby table!
reviews.reviewText: My wife was doing a wire twisting hobby on a tv tray, but need a little more space and something that was easily moved.This fits the bill and is reasonably sturdy given the reasonable price. It does have very small wheels and the brakes are hard to set as they are small, but other than needing to use you hand instead of your foot, work well.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 17, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Flimsy, Too-Short, and Bad wheels: A Letdown on All Fronts
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. Boy, am I disappointed. It seemed like the perfect solution for my workspace needs, but unfortunately, it falls short in more ways than one. Let me break it down for you:First off, let's talk about functionality. The desk claims to be suitable for various purposes, but I found it struggling to hold up even a laptop and a textbook without buckling under the weight. It's frustrating when a desk inhibits rolling due to its own lack of stability.Speaking of rolling, the wheels on this thing are a joke. They don't glide smoothly; in fact, they barely roll. Made of hard plastic with no rubber, they make an irritatingly loud noise and are simply too small to offer any real mobility.Now, let's move on to adjustability. The desk boasts the ability to change heights, but let me tell you, it's not all it's cracked up to be. Even at its highest setting, this desk only reaches up to my waist, and I'm just 5'2" tall. If you plan on using it as a standing desk, forget about it. It falls short, quite literally, and fails to provide adequate height for comfortable standing work.To add insult to injury, the desk also has some serious quality issues. Some of the poles arrived with no caps, leaving sharp edges exposed. Not only is this a safety concern, but it also looks unfinished and poorly constructed. And if that wasn't enough, some of the caps that were included had rough textured surfaces that could potentially cause cuts or scrapes. It's certainly not the kind of attention to detail you'd expect from a product claiming to be durable and reliable.Luckily it was easy to assemble and disassemble-- I was able to put it together leisurely in 20 minutes and take it back apart to return to the seller in about 10.All in all, this adjustable standing desk fails to deliver on its promises. It lacks stability, mobility, and height adjustability. The buckling under weight, ineffective wheels, and limited height range make it a frustrating choice for anyone seeking a functional standing desk solution. Not to mention the quality issues with exposed edges and rough caps, which are simply unacceptable.Save yourself the disappointment and look for a better option (so far I'm liking this one https://amzn.to/43vYlWT with an upgraded of a set of casters) This desk falls short on almost every front, and I cannot recommend it to anyone in search of a reliable and versatile workspace solution.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 6, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Does the job
reviews.reviewText: Decent little movable desk with storage shelves underneath for power cables, etc. I had to move my home office into my bedroom following a surgery and this little guy has come in handy being able to move it easily out of my way to stand and crutch through my house. I will say a star was taken away because the casters do seem very cheap and don’t roll extremely well, but because the desk is so lightweight it’s easy to move regardless. Worth the money!
